/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various hues of the buildings.
